lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD--It is definitely not a good start to the day and the year when the first item on the news headlines is about Blackwater. As I left home this morning I turned ito the radio to hear what the first headlines of 2010 would be. The first bulletin was that charges had been dismissed against five Blackwater guards for killing 17 Iraqis in the Nisour Square shooting of 2007.
snippet: The description we got from eyewitnesses indicated that the guards opened fire on every thing that moved.
abstract: The description we got from eyewitnesses indicated that the guards opened fire on every thing that moved.
